author: michael-pitt
body:
#### PR description:

The XangleBetaStarFilter will be using recently introduced new LHCInfo, and it is a part of post-processing calibration tools used by Proton Objects

#### PR validation:

The new filter was tested with 
`cmsRun CondTools/RunInfo/test/xangleBetaStarFilter_test_cfg.py`
using `CMSSW_14_0_0_pre3`
title: update XangleBetaStarFilter with NewLHCInfo
